articles.description: Google Chrome is reportedly getting a new feature that prevents links from sending users to malicious sites while being opened in a new tab. In this attack, the new tab could load a legitimate page, while your old tab was hijacked and sent to a malicious page.
articles.content: Google Chrome is getting a new feature that improves security for pages that open in a new tab, says a report. The vulnerability Google is fixing, is a kind of tab-napping' where a page would be open… [+1822 chars]
